name: Shadow Force
description:
Shadow Force is an action role-playing game with rogue-lite elements in unique dark universe.

Become a vigilante monster hunter who hunts and slay ancient and terrifying creatures.
Break through the hordes of enemies and traps in a variety of procedurally generated
levels. Find and equip a lot of weapons and tools that change gameplay experience.
Improve your character and weapons to increase the chances of mission success.

Features:

- Room based random generated levels;
- Upgrade system that allow your characters become more powerful and unique;
- Different builds based on equipped weapons and tools;
- Many items, from usual knife to legendary artifacts and relics;
- There is no reason to fight alone, team up with your friends in co-op multiplayer.
